alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 6:41AM MST until September 13 at 7:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 715 AM MST. * At 641 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Downtown Scottsdale, or near Paradise Valley, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Scottsdale, Tempe, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Arizona Mills Mall, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, and Downtown Mesa. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 152 and 155. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 176. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 172 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
